Class tripleplay.ui.Background

Removed Methods
Background centeredImage(Image) Creates a centered image background with the specified image.
Background croppedImage(Image) Creates a cropped centered image background with the specified image.
Background roundRect(int, float) Creates a round rect background with the specified color and corner radius.
Background roundRect(int, float, int, float) Creates a round rect background with the specified colors, border width and corner radius.
Background tiledImage(Image) Creates a tiled image background with the specified image.
 

Added Methods
Background centered(Tile) Creates a centered background with the specified texture tile.
Background cropped(Tile) Creates a cropped centered background with the specified texture tile.
Background roundRect(Graphics, int, float) Creates a round rect background with the specified color and corner radius.
Background roundRect(Graphics, int, float, int, float) Creates a round rect background with the specified parameters.
Background tiled(Texture) Creates a tiled background with the specified texture.
 

Changed Methods
Background image(TileSource) Change in signature from Image to TileSource.
 Creates a background with the specified source.
Scale9Background scale9(Tile) Change in signature from Image to Tile.
 Creates a scale9 background with the specified texture tile.
